Protein Names: Coenzyme A biosynthesis bifunctional protein CoaBC (DNA/pantothenate metabolism flavoprotein) (Phosphopantothenoylcysteine synthetase/decarboxylase) (PPCS-PPCDC) [Includes: Phosphopantothenoylcysteine decarboxylase (PPC decarboxylase) (PPC-DC) (EC 4.1.1.36) (CoaC); Phosphopantothenate--cysteine ligase (EC 6.3.2.5) (CoaB) (Phosphopantothenoylcysteine synthetase) (PPC synthetase) (PPC-S)]
